html:
4.17.23  8:59 am   how do you know how much to tell the truth and be fully honest in a conversation, vs saying responses that fall in line with what the other person wants to hear? This is an art I have not mastered yet

      how about listening. if you don't have a 'response', or think your 'response' is not 'right', then just ask them to tell you more so you can listen more. side note: people don't know what they want to hear anyway, and actually neither do you, which is why it's so much fun to listen

4.17.23  7:43 am   You seem to answer a lot of questions like this: I was going to say no but now that I think about it yes. Why is that?

      it's true, those times. but let's not forget, i also answer a lot of questions differently than that

4.17.23  7:13 am   Hi, how do I fix my sleep schedule? I've tried a lot but it only lasts for 2 or 3 days maximum 

      have you considered accomplishing everything in the universe

4.17.23  5:15 am   What makes you feel powerful? 

      power

4.17.23  4:52 am   whats your fav fruit ?

      melon; or lemon. i can't remember which is which

4.17.23  1:52 am   thoughts on gen z slang

      whoever's naming these gens is about to run out of letters

4.16.23  11:24 pm   what makes a city good

      you

4.16.23  10:49 pm   how to homework??

      for a change, do it away from home

4.16.23  10:35 pm   do you ever wake up on a rock, in the middle of nowhere?

      no, but sometimes i go there in the middle of the day

4.16.23  9:39 pm   who invented mannequins

      clothiers

4.16.23  9:20 pm   do you ever just slide your fingernails across the strings on a guitar and listen to the hideous noises it makes?

      yes

4.16.23  9:16 pm   How many musical numbers do the characters break out into in the next video?

      more like, how many videos do the next musical numbers break out into, in the next characters

4.16.23  8:43 pm   hey bill whats your opinion on the world in general

      round as heck. even rounder than heck, actually

4.16.23  8:02 pm   do you like to eat boats

      no

4.16.23  6:08 pm   i find it very unique that most things on this website have a date and a time. it's so fun to be like, "oh so this is what bill was doing at 3:47am on july 28th 2014." just a bit silly  in my opinion :)

      i take chronology very seriously. in my opinion, time is very serious

4.16.23  3:20 pm   How often do you get stuck while composing music? 

      half the time

4.16.23  1:52 pm   if you put a slice of bread between two slices of cheese, would that be a reverse cheese sandwich or a bread sandwich on cheese

      that's called a 'breakthrough'

4.16.23  1:41 pm   i always ask a question here but forget to check if you answered. i also think i've said this before. what is happening?

      every thing

4.16.23  12:00 pm   Before you starting making videos did you have any experience in visual art of any kind?

      just a small amount of personal experience

4.16.23  11:54 am   How would you react to an asteroid crashing into earth and subsequently destroying our economy

      i'd buy the rock

4.16.23  10:28 am   Do you like eating bees

      no

4.16.23  8:49 am   is it normal to be embarrassed about being different,

     yes, but there's good news, coming your way

      or is that just my anxiety

     yes

4.16.23  8:25 am   How did you make the chord for snail time

      i made it up

4.16.23  7:52 am   predict the next global event

      it will be ok

4.16.23  6:13 am   opinion on flightless birds?

      they claim they can fly

4.16.23  3:18 am   Does technological cutting edge = artistic cutting edge?

      not necessarily

4.16.23  1:41 am   Do you own any garden gnomes?

      no, but luckily the regular gnomes are just as good

4.15.23  11:07 pm   Should I still be a musician even if I don't want to anymore, like for my own good or for something to do? 

      don't do it if you don't want to

4.15.23  10:55 pm   got any map facts?

      yes. maps are very big, but not as big as the place they represent

4.15.23  10:25 pm   is it just me or does your animation portray cloudy thinking and your music prevents it

      that sounds like the kind of ping-pong i'd be into, but there's more configurations than that. sometimes it may be reversed, or some other way

4.15.23  9:21 pm   Tips on how to be the best driver possible?

      drive to the top of mount everest

4.15.23  9:17 pm   do you choreograph the dance scenes in music videos or is it improvised?

      it's usually a mixture of improvisation and common sense

4.15.23  8:27 pm    does pineapple belong on pizza?

      pineapple is pizza

4.15.23  7:42 pm   Is the Curtains restaurant in Perfect Heightd?

      no. it's in Gregnerland, and i regret that i didn't get a chance to get the sign in the video. but now you know

4.15.23  6:41 pm   if you had to pick a number, what would it be?

      1

4.15.23  6:10 pm   You can turn into a cat at will or you can have a cat who will never mind you petting it whenever and even invites you to pet it sometimes. What do you pick? 

     neither of those options are right for me, but i also have to clarify that i don't think i'm capable of either, especially not the first one

4.15.23  5:29 pm   is art subjective?

      even worse, ...... subj is artjective

4.15.23  4:38 pm   How tall is tall?

      i have no idea

4.15.23  4:17 pm   How to write poetry

      just figure out the best word. and write that word down. you're done

4.15.23  2:51 pm   i made a great schedule earlier in the year, and i followed it like my life depended on it. it was great, because it forced me to really move things along and get stuff done. but... something happened - i'm not entirely sure what - and the fear of the deadlines that forced me to get stuff done just vanished. i feel incredibly aimless and i have no idea how to get back on the schedule after i've totally screwed it up. any tips?

      this sounds pretty standard. the brute force you used, to launch the schedule, wore off, and it also exhausted you. it was definitely a good idea to do it, because you learned a lot, and after a little exploring you might even launch another one. but either way, you'll need to get closer to your true desire for doing whatever it is your doing, whatever that may be

4.15.23  2:32 pm   i know that you don't play chess, but if you were a chess opening/defense, which one would you be? would you be a quiet, safe and solid one like the caro-kann defense, or would you be a risky, exhilarating one like the king's gambit?

      how about the intellectually intimidating 'name drop'

4.15.23  2:28 pm   Do you like turmoil?

      sort of

4.15.23  1:59 pm   if you had to summarize the world in 3 or less sentences how would you?

      pretty good

4.15.23  1:39 pm   Why doesn't this world have any smart people? Isn't 8 billion idiots a bit overkill?

      not enough

4.15.23  1:32 pm   what is considered a reasonable amount of sleep per day?

      about 37%

4.15.23  10:13 am   Opinions on rusty scrap metal

      too good to be true

4.15.23  4:20 am   could you fly a kite in space?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.15.23  1:25 am   Has something so good ever happened to you that your mind races?

      yes

4.15.23  1:21 am   What's in the lobster section?

      was supposed to be lobsters. but apparently i blew the budget on sandwiches and soups. which is especially silly considering there also wasn't any budget left to put any customers there

4.14.23  10:51 pm   what is something you can learn by osmosis

      osmosis
